name: make_random_timing.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: Create random stimulus timing files for use with AFNI 3dDeconvolve.

inputs.description: Set the number of runs.
inputs.name: Number of Runs

inputs.description: Set the total time per run (in seconds).
inputs.name: Run Time (seconds)

inputs.description: Set the number of stimulus classes.
inputs.name: Number of Stimulus Classes

inputs.description: Set the number of repetitions per class (or across runs).
inputs.name: Number of Repetitions

inputs.description: Set the prefix for output filenames.
inputs.name: Output Filename Prefix

inputs.description: Set the duration for a single stimulus (in seconds).
inputs.name: Stimulus Duration

inputs.description: Distribute stimuli across all runs at once.
inputs.name: Distribute Stimuli Across Runs

inputs.description: Specify maximum consecutive stimuli per class.
inputs.name: Maximum Consecutive Stimuli

inputs.description: Specify maximum rest between stimuli.
inputs.name: Maximum Rest

inputs.description: Specify extra rest after each stimulus.
inputs.name: Minimum Rest

inputs.description: Specify classes that should not start a run.
inputs.name: Classes Not to Start a Run

inputs.description: Specify classes that should not end a run.
inputs.name: Classes Not to End a Run

inputs.description: Specify an offset to add to every stim time.
inputs.name: Time Offset

inputs.description: Specify a partial ordering of stimuli.
inputs.name: Ordered Stimuli

inputs.description: Specify minimum rest period to start each run.
inputs.name: Pre-Stimulus Rest

inputs.description: Specify minimum rest period to end each run.
inputs.name: Post-Stimulus Rest

inputs.description: Save a 3dDeconvolve -nodata example.
inputs.name: Save 3dDeconvolve Command

inputs.description: Specify a seed for random number generation.
inputs.name: Random Seed

inputs.description: Specify labels for the stimulus classes.
inputs.name: Stimulus Labels

inputs.description: Set the number of decimal places for times.
inputs.name: Decimal Places for Times

inputs.description: Set the time granularity.
inputs.name: Time Granularity

inputs.description: Set the scanner TR.
inputs.name: Scanner TR

inputs.description: Make stimuli timing locked to the accompanying TR.
inputs.name: TR-Locked

inputs.description: Set the verbose level.
inputs.name: Verbose Level

inputs.description: Show statistics from the timing.
inputs.name: Show Timing Statistics
